channel.title: Well god armors
channel.description:
wow i have had to use this section a lot more then i expected but eh what can i say i=noob and its my first time working on a p server
anyways i was wondering why are the god armors i make not going into the right item slots as in they all go into the wep slot for some reason
now im going to go ahead and let you know dont bother telling me that i need to put the item ID into the right place in my item.java i already did that they keep going into the wep slot
i am using the project czar source if that makes any difference as it seems the maker changed a lot of item codes but i have made sure which item codes spawn which pieces of armor so i do know that i put them all in the right places is there anything more i can do
any help would be greatly appreciated thank you

thank you both for the help my main issue was with the body piece but i figured it out for some reason i had to add it to both body and plate

idk just goes to show you how nooby i am lol i dont really know anything about programming im doing this mostly off tuts and the help of my friend who has an awesome server with the same source i am using

item.title: Well god armors
item.dc:creator: @Her_Archerz Her Archerz
item.description:
@Her_Archerz wrote:

of course it isnt in item.java but how would hid god armour go equipt as a weapon? if its new? and yes there is a spot to equipt weapons I am pretty shure I searched whip code in item3.java or mayb it was 2 but I found it along witth plenty more

Read full topic

item.title: Well god armors
item.dc:creator: @danny06 danny06
item.description:
@danny06 wrote:

[quote=“Her Archerz, post:2, topic:171920”]Have you already removed them from the weapons slot?[/quote]Just to let you both know,there is no “wepon slot” in item.java every new item is used as a wepon so you wont be able to find your whip

Read full topic

item.title: Well god armors
item.dc:creator: @Her_Archerz Her Archerz
item.description:
@Her_Archerz wrote:

try search for the god armour codes in item2.java or item3.java I did when d full kept going as weap and I found mine
But my server base is off sleepdev so it may be diff

Read full topic

item.title: Well god armors
item.dc:creator: @gods_50_cal gods 50 cal
item.description:
@gods_50_cal wrote:

if you mean in game yes i have

however if you mean in item.java or another file im afraid i cant find where any of the weapons are i cant even find the whip in my item.java and i use it all the time it just leads me to assume that anything not in item.java just goes straight to the wep slot but i dont know

but if that was the case should my god armor not move after i put it in the right place in item.java?

Read full topic
